Module net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.sheet.api
Package net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.service.sheet

Class PrometheusSheetView

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.service.sheet.PrometheusSheetView
public class PrometheusSheetView extends Object
Represents a view of a range of cells.
